Reviews.Title: very good tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: charles hickle
Reviews.Content: very happy with my tablet. no downside so far. it did advertise Bluetooth but something was lost in translation. requires dongle.

Reviews.Title: very good value
Reviews.Author: Rave "Lena"
Reviews.Content: This is a nice thin design for a tablet.I It is a pleasure to use. The HDMI output is a very nice feature. The SD card slot and extra port makes it's expandability attractive .

Reviews.Title: FastTouch 10' Tablet
Reviews.Author: Tina Marshall
Reviews.Content: Great tablet for the price! Have had to deal with customer service, and they have been fast, efficient, and friendly!! They always got right back to me and always willing to help! Tina M.

Reviews.Title: Excellent tablet
Reviews.Author: Brad B.
Reviews.Content: It has qualities that other don't like the ability to take pictures of the screen, 2 micro usbs nice, mini hdmi, and a separate charging port , so you  don't have to use one of your usbs when your battery gets low very niece.  I love it. Great support and shipping from DIRECT ONLINE SALES.  THANK YOU

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: jazz
Reviews.Content: This tablet is amazing. I use it for school and for fun. It works great and for the price it was totally work it. I recommend it to anyone that is looking for a good tablet

Reviews.Title: Too touchie!!!!
Reviews.Author: it's me
Reviews.Content: Purchased due to the great reviews from amazon.  Very disappointed!  It is WAY TOO EASY to accidently turn the tablet off due to where they placed the button.  When you touch the screen, many times you have to keep touching the words before it will accept your selection.  Also, the instruction manual is worthless.  It does not tell you how to use tablet, and when setting time, most places offered to choose are not in this country!!!!  I would not recommend this tablet to anyone.  Am sending it back!!!!

Reviews.Title: Unit works well but not Bluetooth compatable out of the box
Reviews.Author: Trace E Griglione
Reviews.Content: Other review notes a dongle needed.  You should not have to buy add-ons if it is advertised as "Bluetooth" ready/compatible..
